description:
Reiko runs into Mayu and Yuki who came over to study with Chie and notices something unusual with Yuki’s body. Yuki, who is still developing, is not wearing the correct size bra.
Chie and Mayu watch indifferently as the two share their pain of having a large chest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma proprio est en pleine croissance ?
